summary: An email from an FBI agent forwarding two attached letters (dated 2019-08-05 and 2019-07-28) to an investigative team regarding Epstein tips/communications, noting they are likely not meaningful but being passed along for completeness.

events.title: Letter with Photo Submission
events.description: A letter with a photo was submitted to the FBI office regarding Epstein tips/communications.

events.title: Letter Submission
events.description: A letter was submitted to the FBI office regarding Epstein tips/communications.

events.title: Email Forwarding Tips
events.description: An FBI agent emails an investigative team to forward attached tip communications about Epstein, noting they likely aren't meaningful.

keyFacts: The FBI was receiving and processing tips/communications regarding Jeffrey Epstein as of September 2019.
Two specific letters (dated July 28, 2019, and August 5, 2019) were attached to the email and forwarded to an investigative team.
The FBI agent forwarding the materials expressed a preliminary opinion that the attached communications were 'not meaningful for the investigation' but forwarded them in the interest of completeness.
The correspondence demonstrates an internal FBI process for handling incoming tips related to the Epstein case.
